text: There was a dog that used to bite for no reason. He put a bell on his master to warn people of his near presence. And the dog, ringing the bell, went to the public square to brag. Then a wise woman, an old woman, asked him, "What are you so proud of, my friend? I know you don't wear that bell for your great virtues, but to announce your hidden evil. He boasts of his flaws.
title: El perro con campanilla
author: nan Esopo
